fontTheory.description: The typography system aims to provide a balance between professionalism and modernity, catering to readability and visual appeal.
fontTheory.readability: Careful selection of serif and sans-serif fonts ensures optimal readability across different screen sizes and contexts.
fontTheory.hierarchy: The hierarchy is established through font sizes, weights, and styles, guiding users through the document's structure.
fontTheory.fontPairings: The combination of serif and sans-serif fonts creates a harmonious blend, enhancing the document's visual presentation.
